attributes.action: Deploy ROYAL NAVY to stop ILLEGAL IMMIGRANTS from entering BRITISH WATERS.
attributes.additional_details:
The country is at breaking point and the FRENCH are taking our money and doing nothing to stop this illegal trade . They want rid of them from their country. All countries must return ILLEGAL IMMIGRANTS at their boarders.
All our services are at breaking point . Our infrastructure cannot continue to support these ILLEGAL IMMIGRANTS.
attributes.background: We the UNITED KINGDOM cannot continue to except the influx of illegal immigrants. Our whole country cannot support the influx which stands at 40,000 in 2022.

rejection.details:
The Ministry of Defence has already taken primacy for the UK's operational response to small boat migration in the English Channel, but we have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Take action to prevent illegal attempts to enter UK across the Channel: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/621744
